wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Tortolano (born 6 April 1966) is a Scottish retired professional footballer who played in England, Scotland, and Iceland, making over 300 league appearances.

response: Rae was awarded a testimonial match by Hibs in 1988, played against Manchester United. Joe Tortolano was sent off during the match for a tackle on Gordon Strachan.Hibernian Legends: Joe Tortolano! , Hibernian F.C. official website.
